content: DBS Live Fresh Card Credit Card Asked by Huang YixuanAsked 3w agoIs it possible to get an annual fee waiver for DBS live fresh card?Does anyone have any experience requesting for one?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered 3w agoAlthough I don't hold any DBS cards, you can waive the fee online via  https://www.dbs.com.sg/personal/support/card-waive-credit-card-cashline-charges.html  If that doesn't work, calling in and asking for a waiver will usually work. Banks are usually quite generous in waiving the fee, provided that you have been paying off your bills in full.0 comments5

SLSamuel Lee, Financial Planner at Advisor Alliance Group (AIA)Level 3. WonderkidAnswered 3w agoUsually calling in to DBS will be sufficient in getting your annual fee waiver. I have done this multiple times.0 comments1

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered 3w agoCall in, they got automated replies just for fee waivers.Or go iBanking and fill in the customer service form for the waiver.Most likely will waive. In my experience, POSB/DBS is the easiest bank to get waivers.0 comments1
